column2: In the tumultuous lands of the Border Princes, the formation of leagues between one or various of these contentious realms is usual business. This decision will create a new titular, elective title. Requires an equal-rank cofounder, who will become your vassal.
Tally partners who are adjacent to my realm, including through other partners. Only Human rulers inside the Borderlands region will be taken into account as possible co-founders.
We can vassalize allies who would then become electors in our league.

column1: # OPINION MODIFIER ORIGINS (APPEARS AS HOVER REASON FOR NON-AGGRESSION PACT)

column2: High enough rank to vote in our elections\n
Conclave DLC, or religion allows Feudal Elective succession\n
Ally, NAP, close relative, friend, or tributary\n
I currently have [Root.num_cofounders.GetValue] possible co-founders. With at least a co-founder of equal rank, I can create a higher title!

column1: # TITLES CREATED BY THE BIG EVENT
# NB: NAME BASED ON CAPITAL RATHER THAN PRIMARYTITLE TO PREVENT RECURSIVE NAMES LIKE "PARIS UNION LEAGUE FEDERATION"
# NB: NOT USING "[Root.Capital.GetName] UNION" ETC ON BUTTON LABELS, TO WORK AROUND A BUG WHERE TEXT IS TRUNCATED BEFORE SUBSTITUTION

column2: You sign a 20-year non-aggression pact with each cofounder, preventing you from revoking titles and preventing them from joining factions.\n
Your council members will be relieved of their duties, allowing you to form a new council without the hassle of firing anyone\n
You will be able to hire new council members.\n
I have decided to strengthen our alliance by offering you my full protection as liege lord. Don't forget to vote on who should the next ruler of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
